alert.note: Alert for Newton; Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 6:43PM CST until March 12 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sabine River Near Deweyville. * WHEN...Until Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM CST Thursday the stage was 24.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:45 PM CST Thursday was 24.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday morning and continue falling to 21.8 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Sabine River Deweyville 24.0 24.4 Thu 5 pm CST 24.3 24.1 23.8 &&
